name.type.description: The content type of the Kling video to be generated, such as 'link', 'text', etc.

name.modeStd.description: The standard mode of the Kling video

name.modePro.description: The high-quality mode of the Kling video

name.failure.description: The failure status of the task

name.failureReason.description: The reason for the task failure

name.traceId.description: The trace ID of the task

name.createdAt.description: The date and time when the Kling video was generated

name.cfgScale.description: The reference image for the video to be generated

name.startImage.description: The reference image for the video to be generated

name.negativePrompt.description: The negative text prompt for generating the video

name.endImage.description: The reference image for the video to be generated

name.model.description: The model version used to generate the video

name.ratio.description: The video ratio used to generate the video

name.mode.description: The mode used to generate the video

name.effect.description: The name of the style parameter used to switch between different versions or styles of the model

name.ingredientsModel.description: The model version used to generate the video

name.klingBot.description: The name of the Kling video generator

description.ingredients.message: If you want to upload multiple images to generate your own video, please turn on this button.

description.imageUrl.message: In the multi-image video creation task, it must upload multiple images.

description.prompt.message: The prompt for generating Kling videos

description.negativePrompt.message: Negative text prompt, optional, cannot exceed 200 characters

description.uploadStartImage.message: Upload the first frame image as a reference for generation; the final video will reference the first frame for generation.
description.uploadStartImage.description: Description of the upload reference parameter

description.uploadEndImage.message: Upload the last frame image as a reference for generation; the final video will reference the last frame for generation.
description.uploadEndImage.description: Description of the upload reference parameter

description.cfgScale.message: The freedom level for generating the video, optional [0,1]. The larger the value, the stronger the correlation.
description.cfgScale.description: Description of the upload reference parameter

status.pending.description: The waiting status of the task

status.processing.description: The processing status of the task

placeholder.select.description: Placeholder text in the selection field

placeholder.prompt.message: Enter the prompt for the video style to be generated, e.g., moving
placeholder.prompt.description: Placeholder text in the prompt field

placeholder.negativePrompt.message: Enter the negative prompt for the video style to be generated, no more than 200 characters
placeholder.negativePrompt.description: Placeholder text in the negative prompt field

button.precise.description: Button text for generating Kling videos

button.creative.description: Button text for generating Kling videos

button.generate.description: Button text for generating Kling videos

button.extend.description: Text for the extend video button

button.download.description: Text for the download video button

button.uploadImageUrl.description: Text for the upload image button

button.uploadVideoUrl.description: Text for the upload video button

button.uploadReferences.description: Text for the button that allows users to upload references

message.uploadReferencesExceed.message: You can upload a maximum of 1 image
message.uploadReferencesExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded images exceeds the limit

message.uploadReferencesSuccess.description: Success message when an image is uploaded successfully

message.uploadReferencesError.message: Failed to upload image, please try again later
message.uploadReferencesError.description: Error message when image upload fails

message.startingTask.description: Message when the drawing task starts

message.startTaskSuccess.description: Success message when a task is successfully started

message.startTaskFailed.message: Failed to initiate task, please contact the administrator
message.startTaskFailed.description: Error message when starting the drawing task fails

message.usedUp.message: Your credits are exhausted, please purchase more credits to continue
message.usedUp.description: Message when credits are used up

message.generating.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.downloadVideo.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.extendVideo.description: Message when the image is being generated

message.uploadVideoExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadVideoExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadVideoSizeExceed.description: Error message when the uploaded file size exceeds 10MB!

message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.message: Uploaded file must be in MP4 format!
message.uploadVideoTypeFailed.description: Error message when the uploaded file is not in MP4 format!

message.uploadStartImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadStartImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded first frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadEndImageExceed.message: The number of uploaded last frame images exceeds the limit
message.uploadEndImageExceed.description: Error message when the number of uploaded last frame images exceeds the limit

message.uploadStartImageError.message: Failed to upload first frame image
message.uploadStartImageError.description: Error message when the first frame image upload fails

message.uploadVideoError.description: Error message when the first frame image upload fails

message.uploadEndImageError.message: Failed to upload last frame image
message.uploadEndImageError.description: Error message when the last frame image upload fails

message.uploadDocumentsError.description: Error message when document upload fails

message.noOperations.description: Message when there are no available operations

message.noTasks.message: No historical tasks, please click on the left to generate a video
message.noTasks.description: Message when there are no tasks
